snippet.title: Bad Summer Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
#Badsummergame #indiegame #visualnovel #analoghorror #renpy #datingsim  #indiedev  #analoghorror #horrorgaming 

The wait is almost over. Bad Summer's demo launches on Steam & itch.io on March 3, 2025!

Survive the horrors of Camp Bear Ridge, uncover dark secrets, and face the unknown in this gripping visual novel thriller. Will you make it out alive?

🔥 Wishlist on Steam now: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/3318500/Bad_Summer/]
Check us out on Itch.io: https://sjdreamfree.itch.io/bad-summer
Want to support us? Here's our prelaunch kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/badsummer/bad-summer-a-horror-romance-visual-novel


Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more Bad Summer content! 🎥💀

👀 Follow for updates: 

WEBSITE - sjdreamfree.com

TUMBLR - https://www.tumblr.com/blog/badsummer

TWITTER - https://twitter.com/BadSummerVN

INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/sjgames_dreamfree/

BLUESKY - https://bsky.app/profile/badsummer.bsky.social
